item.name: Spellbinding Menacles
entries: Each of these bellshaped devices is hinged on the side.
When a spellcaster’s fisted hand is forced into the bell, and the device is locked shut, he cannot open his fingers.
The manacles include a short chain allowing the spellcaster’s hands to be chained either in front or behind his body.
Spellbinding manacles are also enchanted with a permanent silence effect, as cast by a 4th level cleric.

item.name: Mundane Spellbinding Menacles
entries: Each of these bellshaped devices is hinged on the side.
When a spellcaster’s fisted hand is forced into the bell, and the device is locked shut, he cannot comfortably open his fingers.
The manacles include a short chain allowing the spellcaster’s hands to be chained either in front or behind his body.
When a spellcaster attempts to cast a spell with somatic components, they must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity skill check, otherwise the casting fails and the spell slot used is consumed.

item.name: Ring of Dalor
entries: The ring is a golden featureless band that is constantly covered in a layer of frost that never melts. It is extremely cold to the touch, and deals {@dice 1d4} cold damage to a creature unattuned to it on touching it.

The ring grants protection against divination magic, requiring a succesful DC 15 check of its spellcasting ability by anyone casting a diviniation spell that would grant information from the creature wearing the ring.

The ring has 5 charges. As a reaction, which the holder takes after an enemy hits him with a ranged attack, he can spend a charge and gain a +3 bonus to his AC, as he unleashes the freezing energy inside the ring in a semisphere that blocks the projectile.

Additionally, the holder can spend a charge to create a blast of freezing energy in a point he can see within 30 feet of him. Any creature other than the holder in a 15-foot sphere must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw and take {@damage 4d8} cold damage and have its speed reduced to 0 on a failed save or half as much on a succesful one and have no speed reduction.
